item.frozensentinel.blanksigildesc: A component for further assignment of sentinels
item.frozensentinel.lesseranimationcored: Use on a snow golem to empower it into a lesser sentinel.
item.frozensentinel.gunnersigildesc: Use on any tier of base sentinel to convert to a gunner sentinel of that tier.
item.frozensentinel.stabbersigildesc: Use on any tier of base sentinel to convert to a stabber sentinel of that tier
item.frozensentinel.snowballersigildesc: Use on any tier of base sentinel to convert to a snowballer sentinel of that tier.
item.frozensentinel.giftersigildesc: Use on any tier of base sentinel to convert to a gifter sentinel of that tier.
item.frozensentinel.zappersigildesc: Use on any tier of base sentinel to convert to a zapper sentinel of that tier.
item.frozensentinel.brawlersigildesc: Use on any tier of base sentinel to convert to a brawler sentinel of that tier.
